speaker: IAGO
text_entry: SCENE III. Another room In the castle.

speaker: IAGO
text_entry: Enter OTHELLO, LODOVICO, DESDEMONA, EMILIA and Attendants

speaker: LODOVICO
text_entry: I do beseech you, sir, trouble yourself no further.

speaker: OTHELLO
text_entry: O, pardon me: 'twill do me good to walk.

speaker: LODOVICO
text_entry: Madam, good night; I humbly thank your ladyship.

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: Your honour is most welcome.

speaker: OTHELLO
text_entry: Will you walk, sir?

speaker: OTHELLO
text_entry: O,--Desdemona,--

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: My lord?

speaker: OTHELLO
text_entry: Get you to bed on the instant; I will be returned

speaker: OTHELLO
text_entry: forthwith: dismiss your attendant there: look it be done.

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: I will, my lord.

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: Exeunt OTHELLO, LODOVICO, and Attendants

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: How goes it now? he looks gentler than he did.

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: He says he will return incontinent:

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: He hath commanded me to go to bed,

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: And bade me to dismiss you.

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: Dismiss me!

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: It was his bidding: therefore, good Emilia,.

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: Give me my nightly wearing, and adieu:

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: We must not now displease him.

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: I would you had never seen him!

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: So would not I my love doth so approve him,

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: That even his stubbornness, his cheques, his frowns--

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: Prithee, unpin me,--have grace and favour in them.

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: I have laid those sheets you bade me on the bed.

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: All's one. Good faith, how foolish are our minds!

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: If I do die before thee prithee, shroud me

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: In one of those same sheets.

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: Come, come you talk.

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: My mother had a maid call'd Barbara:

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: She was in love, and he she loved proved mad

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: And did forsake her: she had a song of 'willow;'

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: An old thing 'twas, but it express'd her fortune,

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: And she died singing it: that song to-night

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: Will not go from my mind; I have much to do,

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: But to go hang my head all at one side,

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: And sing it like poor Barbara. Prithee, dispatch.

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: Shall I go fetch your night-gown?

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: No, unpin me here.

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: This Lodovico is a proper man.

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: A very handsome man.

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: He speaks well.

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: I know a lady in Venice would have walked barefoot

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: to Palestine for a touch of his nether lip.

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: [Singing]  The poor soul sat sighing by a sycamore tree,

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: Sing all a green willow:

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: Her hand on her bosom, her head on her knee,

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: Sing willow, willow, willow:

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: The fresh streams ran by her, and murmur'd her moans;

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: Sing willow, willow, willow;

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: Her salt tears fell from her, and soften'd the stones;

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: Lay by these:--

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: Singing

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: Sing willow, willow, willow;

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: Prithee, hie thee; he'll come anon:--

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: Singing

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: Sing all a green willow must be my garland.

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: Let nobody blame him; his scorn I approve,-

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: Nay, that's not next.--Hark! who is't that knocks?

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: It's the wind.

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: [Singing]  I call'd my love false love; but what

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: said he then?

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: Sing willow, willow, willow:

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: If I court moe women, you'll couch with moe men!

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: So, get thee gone; good night Ate eyes do itch;

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: Doth that bode weeping?

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: 'Tis neither here nor there.

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: I have heard it said so. O, these men, these men!

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: Dost thou in conscience think,--tell me, Emilia,--

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: That there be women do abuse their husbands

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: In such gross kind?

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: There be some such, no question.

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: Wouldst thou do such a deed for all the world?

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: Why, would not you?

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: No, by this heavenly light!

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: Nor I neither by this heavenly light;

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: I might do't as well i' the dark.

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: Wouldst thou do such a deed for all the world?

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: The world's a huge thing: it is a great price.

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: For a small vice.

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: In troth, I think thou wouldst not.

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: In troth, I think I should; and undo't when I had

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: done. Marry, I would not do such a thing for a

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: joint-ring, nor for measures of lawn, nor for

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: gowns, petticoats, nor caps, nor any petty

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: exhibition; but for the whole world,--why, who would

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: not make her husband a cuckold to make him a

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: monarch? I should venture purgatory for't.

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: Beshrew me, if I would do such a wrong

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: For the whole world.

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: Why the wrong is but a wrong i' the world: and

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: having the world for your labour, tis a wrong in your

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: own world, and you might quickly make it right.

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: I do not think there is any such woman.

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: Yes, a dozen; and as many to the vantage as would

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: store the world they played for.

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: But I do think it is their husbands' faults

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: If wives do fall: say that they slack their duties,

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: And pour our treasures into foreign laps,

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: Or else break out in peevish jealousies,

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: Throwing restraint upon us; or say they strike us,

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: Or scant our former having in despite;

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: Why, we have galls, and though we have some grace,

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: Yet have we some revenge. Let husbands know

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: Their wives have sense like them: they see and smell

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: And have their palates both for sweet and sour,

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: As husbands have. What is it that they do

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: When they change us for others? Is it sport?

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: I think it is: and doth affection breed it?

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: I think it doth: is't frailty that thus errs?

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: It is so too: and have not we affections,

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: Desires for sport, and frailty, as men have?

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: Then let them use us well: else let them know,

speaker: EMILIA
text_entry: The ills we do, their ills instruct us so.

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: Good night, good night: heaven me such uses send,

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: Not to pick bad from bad, but by bad mend!

speaker: DESDEMONA
text_entry: Exeunt
